properties.description: Service lookup order/priority.

properties.description: Sets the username to be used for basic authentication

properties.name: camel.component.consul.acl-token
properties.description: Sets the ACL token to be used with Consul

properties.name: camel.component.consul.action
properties.description: The default action. Can be overridden by CamelConsulAction

properties.name: camel.component.consul.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.block-seconds
properties.description: The second to wait for a watch event, default 10 seconds

properties.name: camel.component.consul.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions (if possible) occurred while the Camel consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. Important: This is only possible if the 3rd party component allows Camel to be alerted if an exception was thrown. Some components handle this internally only, and therefore bridgeErrorHandler is not possible. In other situations we may improve the Camel component to hook into the 3rd party component and make this possible for future releases. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.configuration
properties.description: Consul configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.consul.ConsulConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.connect-timeout
properties.description: Connect timeout for OkHttpClient

properties.name: camel.component.consul.consistency-mode
properties.description: The consistencyMode used for queries, default ConsistencyMode.DEFAULT

properties.name: camel.component.consul.consul-client
properties.description: The consul client to use. The option is a org.kiwiproject.consul.Consul type.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.datacenter
properties.description: The data center

properties.name: camel.component.consul.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the consul component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.first-index
properties.description: The first index for watch for, default 0. The option is a java.math.BigInteger type.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.key
properties.description: The default key. Can be overridden by CamelConsulKey

properties.name: camel.component.consul.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.near-node
properties.description: The near node to use for queries.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.node-meta
properties.description: The comma separated node meta-data to use for queries.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.password
properties.description: Sets the password to be used for basic authentication

properties.name: camel.component.consul.ping-instance
properties.description: Configure if the AgentClient should attempt a ping before returning the Consul instance

properties.name: camel.component.consul.read-timeout
properties.description: Read timeout for OkHttpClient

properties.name: camel.component.consul.recursive
properties.description: Recursively watch, default false

properties.name: camel.component.consul.ssl-context-parameters
properties.description: SSL configuration using an org.apache.camel.support.jsse.SSLContextParameters instance. The option is a org.apache.camel.support.jsse.SSLContextParameters type.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.tags
properties.description: Set tags. You can separate multiple tags by comma.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.url
properties.description: The Consul agent URL

properties.name: camel.component.consul.use-global-ssl-context-parameters
properties.description: Enable usage of global SSL context parameters.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.user-name
properties.description: Sets the username to be used for basic authentication

properties.name: camel.component.consul.value-as-string
properties.description: Default to transform values retrieved from Consul i.e. on KV endpoint to string.

properties.name: camel.component.consul.write-timeout
properties.description: Write timeout for OkHttpClient

properties.name: camel.cloud.consul.check-interval
properties.description: How often (in seconds) a service has to be marked as healthy if its check is TTL or how often the check should run. Default is 5 seconds.

properties.name: camel.cloud.consul.check-ttl
properties.description: The time (in seconds) to live for TTL checks. Default is 1 minute.

properties.name: camel.cloud.consul.dc
properties.description: Use datacenter instead

properties.name: camel.cloud.consul.deregister-after
properties.description: How long (in seconds) to wait to deregister a service in case of unclean shutdown. Default is 1 hour.

properties.name: camel.cloud.consul.deregister-services-on-stop
properties.description: Should we remove all the registered services know by this registry on stop?

properties.name: camel.cloud.consul.override-service-host
properties.description: Should we override the service host if given ?

properties.name: camel.cloud.consul.service-host
properties.description: Service host.
